Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Hotel Relais Villa Cornèr della Regina in Vedelago, you'll be connected to the airport and within the vicinity of Golf Club Ca' Amata. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Sanctuary of Noce and Church of St. John the Baptist.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 37 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Your Select Comfort bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities at this Beaux Arts hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge) that operates within 10 km.

Dining
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Vedelago? This hotel has 2691 square feet (250 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and conference space. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a cruise ship terminal shuttle.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Golf Club Ca' Amata - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi
Sanctuary of Noce - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi
Church of St. John the Baptist - 13.4 km / 8.3 mi
Salici Golf Club - 14.3 km / 8.9 mi
Church of San Nicolo - 14.8 km / 9.2 mi
Cathedral of Treviso - 15 km / 9.3 mi
Ca' della Nave Golf Club - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi
Palazzo dei Trecento - 15.2 km / 9.5 mi
Piazza dei Signori - 15.2 km / 9.5 mi
Piazza Rinaldi - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi
Loggia dei Cavalieri - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi
Casa dei Carraresi Exhibition Center - 15.4 km / 9.6 mi
Chiesa di San Francesco - 15.4 km / 9.6 mi
Porta San Tomaso - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
Villa Farsetti - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Relais Villa Cornèr della Regina is Treviso (TSF) - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
